file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  contact:
    email: hello@mainnet.cash
  description: "A developer friendly bitcoin cash wallet api\n\nThis API is currently\
    \ in *active* development, breaking changes may\nbe made prior to official release\
    \ of version 1.0.0.\n"
  license:
    name: MIT Licence
    url: https://github.com/mainnet-cash/mainnet-js/blob/master/LICENSE
  termsOfService: https://mainnet.cash/terms/
  title: Mainnet Cash
  version: 0.5.2
externalDocs:
  description: Find out more about mainnet-js
  url: https://mainnet.cash
servers:
- description: unstable service (for development)
  url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/
- description: local development server via `yarn api:serve`
  url: http://localhost:3000/
security:
- bearerAuth: []
tags:
- description: Use Cashscript contracts
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/contract/
  name: contract
- description: "Use a stock escrow contract, with some helpers."
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/contract/escrow/
  name: contract/escrow
- description: Testnet faucet
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/faucet/
  name: faucet
- description: Mine regtest coins
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/mine/
  name: mine
- description: Stateless convenience utilities
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/util/
  name: util
- description: Interact with wallets
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/wallet/
  name: wallet
- description: Sign and verify messages
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/wallet/sign
  name: wallet/signed
- description: Interact with SLP functions of the wallets
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/wallet/slp
  name: wallet/slp
- description: Invoke wallet utility functions
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/wallet/util
  name: wallet/util
- description: Create webhooks
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/webhook/
  name: webhook
- description: Interact with SmartBch wallets
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/wallet/smartbch
  name: smartbch/wallet
- description: Interact with SmartBch SEP20 contract tokens
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/wallet/smartbch/sep20
  name: smartbch/sep20
- description: Interact with SmartBch contracts
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://rest-unstable.mainnet.cash/api-docs/#/contract/smartbch
  name: smartbch/contract
paths:
  /contract/call:
    post:
      operationId: contractFn
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            example:
              contractId: testnet:TURNME1UQmxaakEwT0dJelpHRXpOVEUzT1RObU5tVmtNVFJqWXpKbVpHVTBOakJpWldOak5XSTJOVGhrT1RFek9EUTBNMkk1WVRNd01EQTNNRGRoTm1FMzpNRE0wT1RjNFlXTTBOalJtTXpVNFlqSXpOV1l4TVRJeE1tVmlObVV3TVRkaFpqa3dNakUxWWprd1lqRm1aamMwTnpGa09XRmxNbUZpWWpWbE1Ea3lOak5pOk1qRTE=::1996128042
              action: send
              function: timeout
              to:
                unit: sat
                cashaddr: bchtest:qpalhxhl05mlhms3ys43u76rn0ttdv3qg2usm4nm7t
                value: 2000
              feePerByte: 1
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContractFnRequest'
        description: Request a new cashscript contract
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContractFnResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: Call a method on a contract
      tags:
      - contract
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/ContractController
  /contract/create:
    post:
      operationId: createContract
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContractRequest'
        description: Request a new cashscript contract
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContractResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: Create a cashscript contract
      tags:
      - contract
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/ContractController
  /contract/escrow/create:
    post:
      operationId: createEscrow
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EscrowRequest'
        description: Request a new escrow contract from a template
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EscrowResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: Create an escrow contract
      tags:
      - contract/escrow
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/ContractEscrowController
  /contract/escrow/call:
    post:
      operationId: escrowFn
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EscrowFnRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContractFnResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: Finalize an escrow contract
      tags:
      - contract/escrow
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/ContractEscrowController
  /contract/escrow/info:
    post:
      operationId: escrowInfo
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            example:
              escrowContractId: escrowContract:testnet:WW1Ob2RHVnpkRHB4ZWpBd2NHczViR1p6TUdzNVpqVjJaak5xT0dnMk5uRm1iWEZoWjJzNGJtTTFObVZzY1RSa2RqST06WW1Ob2RHVnpkRHB4Y201c2RYVm5aVFUyWVdoNGMzazJjSEJzY1RRemNuWmhOMnMyY3psa2EyNTFOSEExTWpjNFlXZz06WW1Ob2RHVnpkRHB4ZW5Od1kzbDNlRzF0TkdaeGFHWTVhMnB5YTI1eVl6Tm5jbk4yTW5aMWEyVnhlV3B4YkdFd2JuUT06TVRBd01EQT0=:::1075184727
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EscrowInfoRequest'
        description: Request parsed information regarding a contract from the escrowContractId
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EscrowInfoResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: Get information about an escrow contract from the escrowContractId
      tags:
      - contract/escrow
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/ContractEscrowController
  /contract/escrow/utxos:
    post:
      description: |
        Returns all UTXOs that can be spent by the
        contract. Both confirmed and unconfirmed UTXOs are included. The endpoint works with contracts generated from templates (i.e. escrow).
      operationId: escrowUtxos
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EscrowContract'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UtxoResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: List specific utxos on any escrow contract
      tags:
      - contract/escrow
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/ContractEscrowController
  /contract/info:
    post:
      operationId: contractInfo
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            example:
              contractId: contract:testnet:TURNME1UQmxaakEwT0dJelpHRXpOVEUzT1RObU5tVmtNVFJqWXpKbVpHVTBOakJpWldOak5XSTJOVGhrT1RFek9EUTBNMkk1WVRNd01EQTNNRGRoTm1FMzpNRE0wT1RjNFlXTTBOalJtTXpVNFlqSXpOV1l4TVRJeE1tVmlObVV3TVRkaFpqa3dNakUxWWprd1lqRm1aamMwTnpGa09XRmxNbUZpWWpWbE1Ea3lOak5pOk1qRTE=::1996128042
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContractInfoRequest'
        description: Request parsed information regarding a contract from the contractId
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContractInfoResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: Get information about a contract from the contractId
      tags:
      - contract
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/ContractController
  /contract/utxos:
    post:
      description: |
        Returns all UTXOs that can be spent by the
        contract. Both confirmed and unconfirmed UTXOs are included. The endpoint works with contracts generated from templates (i.e. escrow).
      operationId: contractUtxos
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Contract'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UtxoResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: List specific utxos on any contract
      tags:
      - contract
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/ContractController
  /faucet/get_testnet_bch:
    post:
      operationId: getTestnetBch
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTestnetBchRequest'
        description: |
          Request to bch faucet
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTestnetBchResponse'
          description: Successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: |
        Get testnet bch
      tags:
      - faucet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/FaucetController
  /faucet/get_testnet_slp:
    post:
      operationId: getTestnetSlp
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTestnetSlpRequest'
        description: |
          Request to slp faucet
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTestnetSlpResponse'
          description: Successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: |
        Get testnet slp tokens
      tags:
      - faucet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/FaucetController
  /faucet/get_testnet_sbch:
    post:
      operationId: getTestnetSbch
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTestnetSbchRequest'
        description: |
          Request to bch faucet
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTestnetSbchResponse'
          description: Successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: "Request testnet SmartBCH funds. The request is enqueued and served\
        \ within 1-3 block confirmations.\nIf the target address holds more that 0.1\
        \ BCH, the request will fail. Otherwise the address will be topped up to 0.1\
        \ BCH.\n"
      tags:
      - faucet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/FaucetController
  /faucet/get_testnet_sep20:
    post:
      operationId: getTestnetSep20
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTestnetSep20Request'
        description: |
          Request to SEP20 faucet
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTestnetSep20Response'
          description: Successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: "Request testnet SmartBch SEP20 tokens. The request is enqueued and\
        \ served within 1-3 block confirmations.\nIf the target address holds more\
        \ that 10 tokens of requested kind, the request will fail. Otherwise the address\
        \ will be topped up to 10 tokens.\n"
      tags:
      - faucet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/FaucetController
  /faucet/get_addresses:
    post:
      operationId: getAddresses
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetAddressesResponse'
          description: Successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: |
        Get addresses to return back or donate the testnet bch and tokens
      tags:
      - faucet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/FaucetController
  /mine:
    post:
      operationId: mine
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/MineRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                items:
                  description: a list of block hashes
                  type: string
                type: array
          description: request accepted
        "400":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid Request
      summary: Mine regtest coins to a specified address
      tags:
      - mine
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/MineController
  /util/convert:
    post:
      operationId: convert
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConvertRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: "If a unit of account is passed, a plain number is returned."
                type: number
          description: successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: convert between units
      tags:
      - util
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/UtilController
  /util/get_addrs_by_xpubkey:
    post:
      operationId: getAddrsByXpubKey
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/getAddrsByXpubKeyRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/getAddrsByXpubKeyResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: "Derive heristic determined addresses from an extended public key,\
        \ per BIP32"
      tags:
      - util
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/UtilController
  /util/get_xpubkey_info:
    post:
      operationId: getXpubKeyInfo
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/getXpubKeyInfoRequest'
        description: "Decode information about an extended public key, per BIP32"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/getXpubKeyInfoResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: "Decode information about an extended public key, per BIP32"
      tags:
      - util
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/UtilController
  /wallet/create:
    post:
      operationId: createWallet
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/WalletRequest'
        description: Request a new random wallet
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/WalletResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: create a new wallet
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/replace_named:
    post:
      operationId: replaceNamed
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/WalletReplaceNamedRequest'
        description: Request parameters
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/WalletReplaceNamedResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: "Replace (recover) named wallet with a new walletId.\nIf wallet with\
        \ a provided name does not exist yet, it will be creted with a `walletId`\
        \ supplied\nIf wallet exists it will be overwritten without exception\n"
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/named_exists:
    post:
      operationId: namedExists
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/WalletNamedExistsRequest'
        description: Request parameters
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/WalletNamedExistsResponse'
          description: successful operation
        "405":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid input
      summary: Check if a named wallet already exists
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/info:
    post:
      operationId: info
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SerializedWallet'
        description: "The wallet to request information about, in serialized form.\n"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/WalletInfo'
          description: "Information about the wallet network, type, and keys\n"
      summary: Get information about a wallet
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/balance:
    post:
      operationId: balance
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BalanceRequest'
        description: |
          Request for a wallet balance
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BalanceResponse'
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: "If a unit of account is passed, a plain number is returned."
                type: number
          description: successful operation
      summary: Get total balance for wallet
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/max_amount_to_send:
    post:
      operationId: maxAmountToSend
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/MaxAmountToSendRequest'
        description: "get amount that will be spend with a spend max request. If a\
          \ unit type is specified, a numeric value will be returned."
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BalanceResponse'
          description: transaction accepted
        "400":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid Request
        "418":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid network for given address
      summary: Get maximum spendable amount
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/deposit_address:
    post:
      operationId: depositAddress
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SerializedWallet'
        description: |
          Request for a deposit address given a wallet
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DepositAddressResponse'
          description: successful operation
      summary: Get a deposit address in cash address format
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/deposit_qr:
    post:
      operationId: depositQr
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SerializedWallet'
        description: |
          Request for a deposit cash address as a Quick Response code (qrcode)
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ScalableVectorGraphic'
          description: "A Qr code image data encoded string in the src field suitable\
            \ for inclusion in html using:\n   - \\<img src\\=\\\"{response.src}\"\
            \\>\n"
      summary: Get receiving cash address as a qrcode
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/send:
    post:
      operationId: send
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SendRequest'
        description: place a send request
        required: true
      responses:
        "202":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SendResponse'
          description: transaction accepted
        "400":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid Request
        "418":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid network for given address
      summary: Send some amount to a given address
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/send_max:
    post:
      operationId: sendMax
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SendMaxRequest'
        description: Request to send all available funds to a given address
        required: true
      responses:
        "202":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SendMaxResponse'
          description: transaction accepted
        "400":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid Request
      summary: Send all available funds to a given address
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/encode_transaction:
    post:
      operationId: encodeTransaction
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EncodeTransactionRequest'
        description: encode a transaction
        required: true
      responses:
        "202":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EncodeTransactionResponse'
          description: transaction accepted
        "400":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid Request
        "418":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid network for given address
      summary: "Encode and sign a transaction given a list of sendRequests, options\
        \ and estimate fees"
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/submit_transaction:
    post:
      operationId: submitTransaction
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SubmitTransactionRequest'
        description: submit an encoded and signed transaction to the network
        required: true
      responses:
        "202":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SubmitTransactionResponse'
          description: transaction accepted
        "400":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid Request
        "418":
          content: {}
          description: Invalid network for given address
      summary: submit an encoded and signed transaction to the network
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController
  /wallet/utxo:
    post:
      operationId: utxos
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SerializedWallet'
        description: |
          Request detailed list of unspent transaction outputs
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UtxoResponse'
          description: successful operation
      summary: Get detailed information about unspent outputs (utxos)
      tags:
      - wallet
      x-eov-operation-handler: controllers/WalletController

        "500":

components:
  schemas:
    UnitType:
      discriminator:
        mapping:
          Utxo: '#/components/schemas/Utxo'
          BalanceRequest: '#/components/schemas/BalanceRequest'
        propertyName: unit_type
      properties:
        unit:
          description: Unit of account.
          enum:
          - bch
          - BCH
          - usd
          - USD
          - bit
          - bits
          - sat
          - SAT
          - sats
          - satoshi
          - satoshis
          example: sat
          type: string
    Utxo:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnitType'
      example:
        utxoId: 1e6442a0d3548bb4f917721184ac1cb163ddf324e2c09f55c46ff0ba521cb89f:0:21005
        index: 0.8008281904610115
        txId: 1e6442a0d3548bb4f917721184ac1cb163ddf324e2c09f55c46ff0ba521cb89f
        value: 100
      properties:
        index:
          type: number
        txId:
          description: The hash of a transaction
          example: 1e6442a0d3548bb4f917721184ac1cb163ddf324e2c09f55c46ff0ba521cb89f
          type: string
        value:
          example: 100
          type: number
        utxoId:
          description: serialized outpoint
          example: 1e6442a0d3548bb4f917721184ac1cb163ddf324e2c09f55c46ff0ba521cb89f:0:21005
          type: string
      required:
      - txId
      - utxoId
      - value
    BalanceRequest:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnitType'
      example:
        walletId: wif:testnet:cNfsPtqN2bMRS7vH5qd8tR8GMvgXyL5BjnGAKgZ8DYEiCrCCQcP6
        slpAware: true
        slpSemiAware: true
      properties:
        walletId:
          description: |
            The walletId to get a balance for.
          example: wif:testnet:cNfsPtqN2bMRS7vH5qd8tR8GMvgXyL5BjnGAKgZ8DYEiCrCCQcP6
          type: string
        slpAware:
          default: false
          description: "If you have any SLP tokens on the address, you should set\
            \ `slpAware` to `true` to prevent accidental token burning This flag activates\
            \ utxo checking against an external slp indexer So far this option is\
            \ not switched on by default"
          example: true
          type: boolean
        slpSemiAware:
          default: false
          description: This flag requires an utxo to have more than 546 sats to be
            spendable and counted in the balance This option is not switched on by
            default
          example: true
          type: boolean
      required:
      - walletId
    SendRequestItem:
      anyOf:
      - description: "Send request in array form ['cashadr', 100, 'sats']"
        items:
          anyOf:
          - type: string
          - type: number
        type: array
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SendRequestItem_anyOf'
    OpReturnData:
      anyOf:
      - description: "OP_RETURN message in format ['OP_RETURN', 'MEMO\\x10LÖL\U0001f605\
          '] or ['OP_RETURNB64', 'TUVNTxBMw5ZM8J+YhQ==']"
        items:
          anyOf:
          - type: string
          - format: byte
            type: string
        type: array
      - description: "OP_RETURN message in object notation, either in plain text or\
          \ as a base64 encoded byte buffer If buffer lacks the OP_RETURN and OP_PUSHDATA\
          \ opcodes, they will be prepended."
        oneOf:
        - properties:
            dataString:
              example: "MEMO\x10LÖL\U0001f605"
              type: string
          required:
          - dataString
          type: object
        - properties:
            dataBuffer:
              format: byte
              type: string
          required:
          - dataBuffer
          type: object
    SendRequestArray:
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/SendRequestArray_inner'
      type: array
    CashscriptReceipt:
      properties:
        to:
          example: bchtest:qpalhxhl05mlhms3ys43u76rn0ttdv3qg2usm4nm7t
          type: string
        amount:
          example: 100
          type: number
    CashscriptReceiptArray:
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/CashscriptReceipt'
      type: array
    ContractFnRequest:
      example:
        minChange: 1.4658129805029452
        feePerByte: 0.8008281904610115
        function: function
        hardcodedFee: 6.027456183070403
        contractId: contractId
        withoutChange: false
        action: send
        arguments:
        - arguments
        - arguments
        to: null
        utxoIds:
        - 1e6442a0d3548bb4f917721184ac1cb163ddf324e2c09f55c46ff0ba521cb89f:0:1000
        - 1e6442a0d3548bb4f917721184ac1cb163ddf324e2c09f55c46ff0ba521cb89f:0:1000
        time: 5.637376656633329
        opReturn:
        - opReturn
        - opReturn
        age: 5.962133916683182
      properties:
        contractId:
          description: |
            serialized contract
          type: string
        action:
          default: send
          description: "In addition to `send`ing the built transaction, the built\
            \ transaction hex may be returned (without broadcasting) with `build`\
            \ action, or the [`meep \U0001f517`](https://github.com/gcash/meep) debugger\
            \ command."
          enum:
          - build
          - send
          - meep
          example: send
          type: string
        function:
          description: Function to call on the cashscript contract.
          type: string
        arguments:
          description: "Arguments for the contract function call as strings.  Binary\
            \ data should be passed as hexidecimal. \nSignatures may be passed as\
            \ wallet import format (WIF) or wallet strings (walletId). Cashscript\
            \ expects `pubkey`s to be compressed 35 byte values.\n"
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        to:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContractFnRequest_to'
        utxoIds:
          description: Serialized utxoId(s) to spend from
          items:
            description: The hash of a transaction and index of the utxo and amount
              in satoshi
            example: 1e6442a0d3548bb4f917721184ac1cb163ddf324e2c09f55c46ff0ba521cb89f:0:1000
            type: string
          type: array
        opReturn:
          description: "Add OP_RETURN outputs to the transaction. See [cashscript\
            \ docs](https://cashscript.org/docs/sdk/transactions#withopreturn)\n"
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        feePerByte:
          description: "The withFeePerByte() function allows you to specify the fee\
            \ per per bytes for the transaction. See [cashscript docs](https://cashscript.org/docs/sdk/transactions#withfeeperbyte)\n"
          type: number
        hardcodedFee:
          description: "Specify a hardcoded fee to the transaction. By default the\
            \ transaction fee is automatically calculated by the CashScript SDK. See\
            \ [cashscript docs](https://cashscript.org/docs/sdk/transactions#withhardcodedfee)\n"
          type: number
        minChange:
          description: "Set a threshold for including a change output. Any remaining\
            \ amount under this threshold will be added to the transaction fee instead.\
            \ See [cashscript docs](https://cashscript.org/docs/sdk/transactions#withminchange)\n"
          type: number
        withoutChange:
          default: false
          description: "Disable the change output. See [cashscript docs](https://cashscript.org/docs/sdk/transactions#withoutchange)\n"
          type: boolean
        age:
          description: "Specify the minimum age of the transaction inputs. See [cashscript\
            \ docs](https://cashscript.org/docs/sdk/transactions#withage)\n"
          type: number
        time:
          description: "Specify the minimum block number that the transaction can\
            \ be included in. See [cashscript docs](https://cashscript.org/docs/sdk/transactions#withtime)\n"
          type: number
      required:
      - contractId
      - function
      - to
    ContractFnResponse:
      example:
        debug: |
          meep debug -- --idx=0 --amt=21000 --pkscript=a914d411d850ed6395e6e72a5e0497a54ab99a75b84387
        contractId: contractId
        txId: 1e6442a0d3548bb4f917721184ac1cb163ddf324e2c09f55c46ff0ba521cb89f
        hex: 0200000001f6d804c0a2f33936dd8b535d1... bdf0e43b30135be5251
      properties:
        contractId:
          description: |
            serialized contract
          type: string
        txId:
          description: The hash of a transaction
          example: 1e6442a0d3548bb4f917721184ac1cb163ddf324e2c09f55c46ff0ba521cb89f
          type: string
        hex:
          description: The transaction as bitcoin encoded hex.
          example: 0200000001f6d804c0a2f33936dd8b535d1... bdf0e43b30135be5251
          type: string
        debug:
          description: "if a debugger action is passed in the request, the result\
            \ will return here."
          example: |
            meep debug -- --idx=0 --amt=21000 --pkscript=a914d411d850ed6395e6e72a5e0497a54ab99a75b84387
          type: string
    Error:
      example:
        message: An server error occurred
        code: 500
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        code:
          type: number
    NetworkEnum:
      discriminator:
        mapping: {}
        propertyName: network
      properties:
        network:
          description: network type
          enum:
          - mainnet
          - testnet
          - regtest
          example: testnet
          type: string
    ContractRequest:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/NetworkEnum'
      example:
        parameters:
        - 03410ef048b3da351793f6ed14cc2fde460becc5b658d9138443b9a3000707a6a7
        - 034978ac464f358b235f11212eb6e017af90215b90b1ff7471d9ae2abb5e09263b
        - 215
        script: "contract TransferWithTimeout(pubkey sender, pubkey recipient, int\
          \ timeout) {\n    function transfer(sig recipientSig) {\n        require(checkSig(recipientSig,\
          \ recipient));\n    }\n\n    function timeout(sig senderSig) {\n       \
          \ require(checkSig(senderSig, sender));\n        require(tx.time >= timeout);\n\
          \    }\n}\n"
      properties:
        script:
          description: |
            The smart contract in cashscript syntax
          example: "contract TransferWithTimeout(pubkey sender, pubkey recipient,\
            \ int timeout) {\n    function transfer(sig recipientSig) {\n        require(checkSig(recipientSig,\
            \ recipient));\n    }\n\n    function timeout(sig senderSig) {\n     \
            \   require(checkSig(senderSig, sender));\n        require(tx.time >=\
            \ timeout);\n    }\n}\n"
          type: string
        parameters:
          description: Parameters to construct the contract
          example:
          - 03410ef048b3da351793f6ed14cc2fde460becc5b658d9138443b9a3000707a6a7
          - 034978ac464f358b235f11212eb6e017af90215b90b1ff7471d9ae2abb5e09263b
          - 215
          items:
            description: "Parameters passed as an array, where binary values are passed\
              \ as hex"

          type: array

      - network
      - parameters
      - script

          description: |
            serialized contract

          type: string
        cashaddr:

        - e7fe7119a6bb73409a087e0ac46cefada815b69f

        - 10000

        nonce: 1996128042
        script: "pragma cashscript ^0.6.1;\ncontract escrow(bytes20 sellerPkh, bytes20\
          \ buyerPkh, bytes20 arbiterPkh, int contractAmount, int contractNonce) {\n\
          \n    function spend(pubkey signingPk, sig s, int amount, int nonce) {\n\
          \        require(hash160(signingPk) == arbiterPkh || hash160(signingPk)\

          type: string

            The escrow contract in cashscript syntax
          example: "pragma cashscript ^0.6.1;\ncontract escrow(bytes20 sellerPkh,\
            \ bytes20 buyerPkh, bytes20 arbiterPkh, int contractAmount, int contractNonce)\
            \ {\n\n    function spend(pubkey signingPk, sig s, int amount, int nonce)\

            \ refund(pubkey signingPk, sig s, int amount, int nonce) {\n        require(hash160(signingPk)\

            \ == contractNonce);\n        bytes34 output = new OutputP2PKH(bytes8(amount),\
            \ buyerPkh);\n        require(hash256(output) == tx.hashOutputs);\n  \
            \  }\n}            \n"

        slpSemiAware: true
        awaitTransactionPropagation: false
        utxoIds:
        - 1e6442a0d3548bb4f917721184ac1cb163ddf324e2c09f55c46ff0ba521cb89f:0:5000

      properties:

          description: |
            Cash address to receive change to
          example: bchtest:qzd0tv75gx6y0zspzwqpgkwkq0n72g8fsq2zch26s2
          type: string
        slpAware:
          default: false
          description: "If you have any SLP tokens on the address, you should set\
            \ `slpAware` to `true` to prevent accidental token burning This flag activates\
            \ utxo checking against an external slp indexer So far this option is\
            \ not switched on by default"
          example: true
          type: boolean
        slpSemiAware:
          default: false
          description: This flag requires an utxo to have more than 546 sats to be
            spendable and counted in the balance This option is not switched on by
            default
          example: true
          type: boolean
        queryBalance:
          default: true
          description: "A boolean flag to include the wallet balance after the successful\
            \ `send` operation to the returned result If set to false, the balance\
            \ will not be queried and returned, making the `send` call faster"
          example: false
          type: boolean
        awaitTransactionPropagation:
          default: true
          description: "A boolean flag to wait for transaction to propagate through\
            \ the network and be registered in the bitcoind and indexer. If set to\
            \ false, the `send` call will be very fast, but the wallet UTXO state\
            \ might be invalid for some 500ms."
          example: false
          type: boolean
        feePaidBy:
          default: change
          description: "Fee allocation stragety. Convenience option to subtract fees\
            \ from outputs if change is not sufficent to cover transaction costs.\n\
            \  * `change` - Change, pay the fees from change or error\n  * `firstOutput`\
            \ - First Output, pay the fee from the first output or error\n  * `lastOutput`\
            \ - Last Output, pay the fee from the last output or error\n  * `anyOutput`\
            \ - Any Output, pay the fee from dust outputs or divide across all remaining\
            \ non-dust outputs.\n  * `changeThenFirst` - Use change then first output\
            \ or error.\n  * `changeThenLast` - Use change then last output or error.\n\
            \  * `changeThenAny` - Use change then any output stragety or error.\n"
          enum:
          - change
          - firstOutput
          - anyOutputs
          - lastOutput
          - changeThenFirst
          - changeThenAny
          - changeThenLast
          type: string
      type: object

    WatchAddressRequest:
      example:
        recurrence: recurrent
        cashaddr: bchtest:qzd0tv75gx6y0zspzwqpgkwkq0n72g8fsq2zch26s2
        tokenId: ""
        type: "transaction:in,out"
        url: http://example.com/webhook
        duration_sec: 86400
      properties:
        cashaddr:
          description: |
            Cash address to watch
          example: bchtest:qzd0tv75gx6y0zspzwqpgkwkq0n72g8fsq2zch26s2
          type: string
        url:
          description: Url to be called when configured action is triggered
          example: http://example.com/webhook
          type: string
        type:
          default: "transaction:in,out"
          description: Type of watch operation
          enum:
          - transaction:in
          - transaction:out
          - "transaction:in,out"
          - balance
          - slptransaction:in
          - slptransaction:out
          - "slptransaction:in,out"
          - slpbalance
          example: "transaction:in,out"
          type: string
        recurrence:
          default: once
          description: Action recurrence. Indicates if webhook should be triggered
            recurrently until expire or only once
          enum:
          - once
          - recurrent
          example: recurrent
          type: string
        tokenId:
          description: Token unique hexadecimal identifier to use. Mandatory in SLP
            webhooks.
        duration_sec:
          default: 86400
          description: Duration of the webhook lifetime in seconds before it will
            expire.
          example: 86400
          type: number
      required:
      - cashaddr
      - type
      - url
    WatchAddressResponse:
      example:
        id: 1
      properties:
        id:
          description: Webhook Id created in the system
          example: 1
          type: integer
